results.title: Sand and flame
results.brief_description: Open with a survey of the development of glass-making and the art of the early glass-blower. Shows manufacture of wide range of glass products, including the automatic bottle-making process; manufacture of fine glass tubing; transformation of glass marbles into glass fibre; production of glass bricks; furnacing, rolling, cutting, grinding and polishing of plate glass; manufacture of shatter-proof plate glass.

results.title: San Francisco Bay Area Rapid Transit: conflict with Berkeley
results.brief_description: The basis of the conflict between BART (Bay Area Rapid Transport) and the Berkley Community was whether tracks, for a kind of railway, should be placed over or under ground. The mayor of the time and some other people explain how the fight was conducted and the strategies of BART and Berkeley and the final victory for Berkeley.

results.title: San Andreas fault
results.creator_credit: Bert Van Bork, American Geological Institute and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Presents evidence of geological forces at work relating to the causes of earthquakes. Describes the scientific methods used to study current seismic activity in the San Andreas Fault in California.

results.title: Samoa [Widescreen]
results.brief_description: A graphic insight into the lives of the people of Samoa, an idyllic island group in the South Pacific, with a gentle climate, rich soil. Mountain peaks, and abundant water. Describes some f the elaborate ceremonies and customs developed by the Samoans. Shows the collecting and processing of copra, the principle export.

results.title: Samoa
results.creator_credit: Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
results.brief_description: A survey of native life, customs and cultural activities in Western Samoa. The islanders are seen at work - making baskets, and copra, picking coconuts, bread0frut, and bananas, building a church, and fishing. Glimpses inside hospitals and medical centres illustrate the work being undertaken in safeguarding the health of the native. Recreational activities include Samoa cricket, singing and dancing.

results.title: Samba to slow fox
results.brief_description: A highly entertaining documentary about Australian ballroom dancing, from the competition glamour to interviews with the people inside the dancing shoes. This will appeal even to those who don’t know the difference between a samba and a slow fox. Rated: G

results.title: Sam Weller and his father
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales from Charles Dickens”.
Shows Sam Weller and his father collaborating on a plan to get Mr Pickwick out of the debtor’s prions and finally managing to give the detestable Mr Stiggins, a lay preacher, a sharp lesson. From the series “Tales from Dickens.”

results.title: Sam Smith: Genuine England
results.creator_credit: Shaw Ashton, Andrew Lee and Arts Council of Great Britain
results.brief_description: An insight into the life and work of Sam Smith, doll-maker extraordinaire. He relates snippets from his life as he discusses the making of his unusual dolls.

results.title: Sam's secret
results.brief_description: An animated instructional piece on selling strategy. Various examples of good and bad selling techniques are shown - centring on the comic character of salesman Sam.

results.title: Salting and soil reclamation
results.brief_description: Explains how the salt concentration in arid soils can be built up due to over-irrigation and removal of overgrowth; how salting can be prevented in irrigation areas by controlled irrigation and how, when salting does occur, the land can be used for pastures or reclaimed and brought back to full production by tile drainage.
results.description: Explains how the salt concentration in arid soils can be built up due to over-irrigation and removal of overgrowth; how salting can be prevented in irrigation areas by controlled irrigation and how, when salting does occur, the land can be used for pastures or reclaimed and brought back to full production by tile drainage.
